sn45.157:1.1: “Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, uppannam mahamegham, tamenam mahavato antarayeva antaradhapeti vupasameti;
sn45.157:1.2: evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ariyam atthangikam maggam bhavento ariyam atthangikam maggam bahulikaronto uppannuppanne papake akusale dhamme antarayeva antaradhapeti vupasameti.
sn45.157:1.3: Kathanca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ariyam atthangikam maggam bhavento ariyam atthangikam maggam bahulikaronto uppannuppanne papake akusale dhamme antarayeva antaradhapeti vupasameti?
sn45.157:1.4: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammaditthim bhaveti …pe… sammasamadhim bhaveti vivekanissitam viraganissitam nirodhanissitam vossaggaparinamim …
sn45.157:1.5: evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ariyam atthangikam maggam bhavento ariyam atthangikam maggam bahulikaronto uppannuppanne papake akusale dhamme antarayeva antaradhapeti vupasameti”ti.
